Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades

Class XadesSigner

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades.AbstractXadesSigner
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.xades.XadesSigner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Signer
Direct Known Subclasses:
XadesCoSigner
public class XadesSigner extends AbstractXadesSigner implements Signer
Esta classe cria uma assinatura CXdES em um documento. Estende AbstractXadesSigner e implementa Signer.
